decision_conditions: <p>No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, plumbing, pipes, flues, vents or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved. All new external rainwater goods and soil pipes shall be of traditional design to match the existing, formed of cast iron and painted black.</p><p>REASON: To enhance the Listed Building in accordance with The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.<br></p>

<p>Prior to the commencement of the roof windows, details of the proposed roof windows shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The required details shall include;</p><ul><li>Conservation style windows, in black steel and fitted flush;</li><li>A manufacturer’s specification and illustration of the roof windows;</li><li>A 1:20 scale elevation drawing showing the glazing pattern and 1:5 scale vertical and horizontal cross section drawings showing the location of the rooflight in relation to the roof structure and covering, the frames, the dimensions of the glazing, the profile and dimensions of the glazing bars and spacers (if any).&nbsp;</li></ul><p>The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p>REASON: To enhance the Listed Building in accordance with The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.<br></p>

<p>The proposed new sash window, hereby approved, shall accurately replicate, in terms of material, profile and detailing, the original historic windows of the property. They shall be painted timber, double-hung 6/6 sash windows with a slim profile and narrow integral (not applied) glazing bars with a putty finish (not timber bead). The glazing shall be no greater than 12mm (4mm glass : 4mm gas : 4mm glass) in total thickness. They shall use traditional cords and weights (not spring balances). No horns, trickle vents or metallic/perforated spacer bars are permitted.</p><p>REASON: To enhance the Listed Building in accordance with The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
subdivision_of_building: First floor and second floor (loft). Flat 76C.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

description: Alteration to one roof light on rear slope of roof; Insertion of two rooflights; Insertion of window on rear elevation; Alteration of Internal layout and general refurbishment on first floor; Loft conversion.
